text: Fast quoting process from their website and good customer service over the phone. I got 50 bucks more than I expected and they picked my car up the same day. Free towing, which is nice. I would recommend Sell Us Your Car Online to anyone with a junker or wreck they are trying to unload. No hassles and they paid cash.

I had a good experience with your company.  It was easy to log on to your web site and give the vital info about the car.  You responded quickly via email and answered my questions quickly as well.  The car was picked up quickly.  Very pleased with your company...I will spread the word.

Thanks for working with us.  Just didn't need that car any longer.

I had a wonderful experience with SellUsYourCarOnline.com. I appreciate how quick and painless the entire process was. The compensation was fair and straight forward. I would gladly recommend your website to friends.

I had my vehicle on craig's list and had so many weirdo's come by my house to look at the car.  I hated it.  This was such an easy way to sell my car.  They were so friendly, honest price and took care of everything.  I will always tell people that this is the easiest and safest way to sell your own car.

The driver was very polite and accomodating.  He was a great representative for your company.  I will definately share your company information with other people.
Thank you

I want thank you and your company for making this process an overall good transaction. There are so many dishonest companies out there and I can truly say you guys are true blue and I would definitely recommend you to others. Once again thank you and Happy Holidays to you and yours....

I was told that my car would be purchased for 500.00 on saturday between 6:30am and noon, also that I would recieve a call one hour prior to pick-up. No call ever came in and no one showed up to complete the deal. Then after several un-successful attempts to reach anybody, I emailed and called, I was sent an offer of 375.00 for my vehicle. If this is the standard practice of this company, I'd advise people to consider all the other recycling yards in the Phoenix area, such as Arizona Auto Parts, Ecology Auto Recycling, or Pick-A-Part. The single most frustrating thing about sellusyourcaronline is that I was asked to wait a 5 1/2 hour span for a call from someone, which never happened. The cooler part of the day was totally wasted. As for the company itself, I can only base their concerns with customers satisfaction with my own experiances. We all know that business' are out to make profits. But to be-little a customer is not acceptable by any means. And to leave the customer stuck waiting for contact, and not following through with that is even more un-acceptable. And finally to put out a lower offer on the same vehicle is just an insult.

Thanks Sell Us Your Car Online for the great service you’ve provided. I'm really thankful to have found a company like you. Everyone was so very friendly and honest, you made it easy to sell my car. I will suggest you to all my friends for your type of services.
Excellent service!! You made it so easy and fast to sell my car. Got a really good price for it. Will recommend your website to my family and friends.
Sell Us Your Car Online did an amazing job getting me the most money out of my cay. This was such an easy process to sell my car.
Sell Us Your Car Online is a great place to sell your car. They gave me a great price for my car. FAST and EASY!!!!!!!

I was in a situation where the only way I could get any money for my old car was to sell it for salvage or junk.  I was reluctant but after going around with the MVD one too many times I started contacting all the companies online and in the yellow pages I could find.  Sell us Your Car Online gave me hands down the best price of all of them with no haggling, and the lady in the office, Linda was very patient and kind enough to explain to me how the process worked and why the MVD was not helping me.  She was the first person who listened to the particular issues and worked with me to resolve them and get me the best price for my car.  The day of pick-up, I asked for a call ahead of an hour, the driver Brian, called and told me when he would be there and arrived within a close enough time of that to say they were on time (10 -20 mins which to me, is well within, in fact more than reasonable)  no open ended windows, or calls then one to two hours late.  Brian was very professional, courteous and made something slightly difficult for me (c'mon everyone has been attached to a car for some reason or other in their life - this was mine) very quick and painless.   Papers signed, he paid me and went about his business of loading the car quickly and left.  He also followed up with a quick thank you for your business and have a great day message, which for me put the icing on the cake of a company that is fair and treats their customers with respect, like a real live human being, and still  maintains the highest standards of professionalism and excellent customer service. (which is supposed to be about human beings ..this company gets it!) I would not hesitate to call them if I am in that situation again, and have already told many people about their great service and how easy it was.

I have had a terrible experience with these people.All seemed to be going well at first but then no answer to their phone and unable to get through to them on email.  They told me that MVD had notary which is untrue.They told me that they would pick up my car before noon on Saturday and never showed up or called or sent an email. quote #20449

Brian came to my house and worked soooo hard to get my gate open to he could haul my truck!!! The company made it so easy and I felt really rewarded for what I got out of my truck. Will refer to everyone!!!!
Brian came to pick up my vehicle. He was very helpful and friendly. I would recommend him to anyone.

Replaced my busted sliding glass door to my patio. Thought it could be repaired but I guess the crack was too severe and the insulation was ruined. Best price I found and the technician inspected the window size before they delivered the glass. He also fixed my roller on the door which was sticking but didn't have to - excellent customer service.

This is a great company! They are very professional from the time you call their office to when they complete the job. I would never hesitate to recommend Superior Replacement Windows Phoenix to all my co-workers.

I am so happy with the results and will not only use this company again if needed but will refer my friends to them.

Superior Replacement Windows did an AWESOME job! Not only did they do great work; they were nice and fast! Their technicians took measurements, quoted me a fair price, and had it installed the next morning. I will use them again in the future.

Knowledgeable staff and prompt service at my office. I used my insurance and got $100 cash for my windshield replacement. Can't beat that. They were flexible with my work schedule and showed up on time. Overall great experience.

I was following a large truck full of gravel on the freeway. They didn't secure the tarp and a rock fell off and hit my window. When I called the company number off the truck they told me "OH WELL". I was really disappointed... Until I called New Image Auto Glass. They assured me that they could replace my widnshield at no cost to me. I was more surprised to receive a gift card as a "thank you" for my business. They really went above and beyond. :0), thanks!

I would like to recomend that everyone take the time to go and get parts from Pick A Part The Yard is always rotating fresh stock. I help alot of my neighbors with repairs to make a little extra cash and always get my parts from Pick A Part. I get the parts cheap and get to make a little markup for pulling them it is the greatest thing ever for me...!

My car broke down and I was really worried because the dealer wanted to much money for the parts to fix it.  A friend told me about Pick A Part, but I had never been to a auto parts yard so I wasn't sure what to expect.  It was great!  I coudln't believe how many cars they have...and I did find my parts for at least 1/2 the price of what the dealer wanted.  The guys at the yard were so helpful to.  I'll never go back to a dealer for parts.

I recommend to everyone!!! You will lost a lot if you will not go there. One auto mechanic ask me $600, but I came here, I paid for some details $35 and changed them by myself and my trouble was fixed for 10 minute.
Your choice 35$ OR $600?
Pick A Part has the best selection of used parts at there yard in Phoenix area. You will find all parts you need at an affordable price.
Pick A Part is the best place in the Phoenix area to find cheap parts. You can find easily the all parts you need at affordable prices. Their staff was very accommodating and helpful.
I could never believe that Pick A Part had everything I needed in quality used auto parts at great prices. It only cost me half the money to repair me car. Will never hesitate going back again.

They are always helpful, polite and efficient. Pick A Part have adjusted prices to keep their products the lowest prices around Phoenix so, I don't have to drive all over town. I would definitely coming back again.

Tony at the mesa store took cash to have his friend swap an engine he sold me he spoke English when he took cash for the job now a week later the car does not run and he forgot how to speak English is it ok to take cash And not give a reciept

I have now had two bad experiences at this yard.  First and foremost, there is no published price list, which should have sent up warning flags but didn't.  Essentially what happens is you pull the part and then they decide what to charge you, based on how much they think you will pay.  If you look like you are from the burbs,or something other than a bum prepare to pay extra.

The first incident occurred on 9/1/2013.  I purchased some transmission parts.  When I got to the counter, the employee looked over what I had and told me my bill was $100.  That seemed a little steep considering I only had 3 master cylinders and a transmission line.  I questioned what everything cost and he explained that the master cylinders were $30 a piece and the trans line was was $5.  I should have put the brakes on right there but I didn't.  Looking at the receipt when I got home, I noticed that the master cylinders were only $20 a piece and that the employee had tacked on a $20 Misc Trans charge for a non-existent part.  Obviously as a way to up-charge me because he thought I'd pay it.

The second incident was on 9/4/2013.  I returned to the yard against my better judgment, but this time I had a plan.  I would call from the yard once I had located my parts and request a quote.  I pulled one brake booster and one pedal cluster.  I then called the desk and they quoted me $35 for the booster and $25 for the pedal cluster.  No problem, I took my parts up to the counter where the same employee from the 9/1/2013 incident asked me suspiciously if I had gotten a quote.  I said yes and told him what I had been quoted.  The employee stated that the price on the pedal cluster must have been a mistake because they are $65 not $25.  Now it had taken me an hour of work in 100+ degree temperatures to pull that cluster so for better or worse I wasn't leaving without it.  When I questioned the change in price, the employee huffed and puffed and told me he would sell it to me for $45, $20 more than what I was originally quoted.

Needless to say, I will never return to this yard and I recommend that other do the same.  The U-Pull and Pay down the road has a published price list and no games, I will be going there from now on.

Very hard to get a proper price from these folks, much more expensive than nearby yards, but, better selection. 

Commonly quoted one price but, more expensive once you are at the counter to purchase.
Need a throttle body injector seat for a 95 GMC 1500 4x4 5.7 engine. Not the injectors or the pressure regulator.

I have been driving it for a month now and it runs absolutely like new again...! Thanks guys for all your help I will recommend others...!
Just Trucks Helped us by buying our junk car, They paid more than anyone else would and towed it for free. My Mom is glad to have her driveway back again...!

I was recently in a situation where my transmission stopped functioning properly and it was diagnosed with internal failure L The estimate for repairs was just over $3000 – which was WAY MORE than I could afford!  I called around for help, and was given the number to Just Truck and Van. Their Full Service Department got me the part at almost half the cost of new, and with a warranty that was 1 year longer than the new part.  I am so glad I did the research.

WARNING! I've been to this yard several times in the past year. Everytime, I have been OVERCHARGED except when the manager was NOT there. The manager is incompetent and not does not know much about the parts he tries to sell. I will NEVER go back there EVER. TOTAL RIP-OFF!!!

Thank you for saving my smile and my health. I wish I could have done this 10 yrs ago when the pain in my mouth started. Thanks for the Dentures the pain in my mouth is gone and I can drink cold drinks again and even enjoy eating any food I want without any pain.

Over the last 15 years I have had two sets of dentures made.  In this time period I have experienced nothing but the best quality denture care one would  expect.  Typical of any medical or dental service, one would expect hidden charges or prolonged wait times, that is not the case.  In addition, you could not ask for a more experienced friendly staff.

SR Windows & Glass made it easy for me to get my windows and glass doors replaced. I had older dual pane units and some had seal failures and hard water stains from my sprinklers. The new glass looks amazing and they are noticeably cooler. I opted to get the low-e coated glass. Thanks to everyone at SR Windows & Glass for making the process and enjoyable one.

Our customer experience with SR Windows & Glass was excellent from the first office call through the estimator and installer. 
Angel (estimator and installer) was an "angel".  Courteous, thorough and professional. 
We replaced the parts for 5 windows including two new windows.  The pricing was less than a quarter of what it might have been had we replaced all 4 of the windows including frames. 
We live in Anthem and the windows were installed 17 years ago. SR found the parts within a couple of weeks and a few days later the job was done.
